description:
Now the armor stands will have better and fun poses, which could be useful to decorate in your worlds.
You can also choose if you want the plate base of the armor stand to be displayed or not. Also head over to the resource pack option.
short_description: This resource pack modifies most poses that default to armor support.

description:
I’ve created a shader with high quality and vibrant color with special feature you wont find in other low end shaders!!
Voxel Shaders features amazing stuff like glowing ores, vibrant world colors and much more!!
short_description:
Ever wanted to play with Realistic shader but your devices isn’t capable of doing so?

Well worry no more..

description:
RUSPE Shaders focuses on realism and performance!

Changelog
Fixed the bug where if you move the water moves faster
short_description: Do you want the luxury of ultra shaders without the expense of horrendous performance?

description:
The main idea for this pack is to offer an alternative set of models which are more detailed and realistic. All mobs still have a blocky design, so it stays true to the original design. Overall, it’s a very neat pack with some great details!

Changelog

Wither Skeleton
Leather shoulder pads
Sword shaft instead of quiver (it didn’t make any sense)
Snow Golem
Texture fixes
Spiders
Texture fixes (cave spider)
Fangs
Zombies
Leg size fixes
Sheep
Short tail
Enderman
Slightly curved limbs
Vex
Ghost hood
Pig
Tail texture fix
A little bit fatter
Bent hind legs
Drowned
Head is titled to look up the surface
Polar Bear
3D tail
Detailed segments
Claws
short_description: This resource pack adds new models for most of the mobs in-game.

description:
Creator: Wedhro (PC/Java Edition Texture)
The textures have a much smoother design and the colors look calmer and better blended than the default textures. The texture pack have been developed for over a period of several years and this proves that it stands the test of time.

Changelog:

New
Blue ice.
Treasure map, drowned spawn egg, and fish spawn egg textures.
Tweaks
A fast & dirty fix to water color. It\’s still over the top but there’s not to do until Mojang keeps their hyper-saturated colors hardcoded.
Sand is a little more wavy and grainy (for the unmptenth time).
Dead Bush is a little darker.
Updated ender dragon fireball texture.
Fixed flowing lava textures finally.
Technical
Updated flipbook texture list.
Pack now uses correct version number.
short_description: Pixel Reality is a low resolution texture pack pack which adds more realism to Minecraft.

description:
It has always been a little strange having the Moon rise over this build, so this resource pack will fix that. The resource pack replaces the Moon texture image with an image of Earth which helps give the entire build more realism.
It’s clearly mainly just going to look good on builds where you’re trying to emulate a moon environment.

Changelog

Better quality / higher resolution of the Earth
Also features the Earth rising into Minecraft’s daylight cycle
short_description: This texture has been created specifically to work with the Moonscape build, but it will work equally well with other Space themed builds.

description:
Fluffy texture update Some textures have been changed. Wood, leaves, coral, etc.

Changelog
Fluffy texture ver3
The texture has been changed.
Stripped_log
ConcretePowder
Jack o'Lantern
Banner
Double_slab
Please see the images for more details.
short_description: Thank you for downloading this resource pack. This resource pack should be used in creative mode.

description:
It even changes ocean biome colors, so that it’s easier to distinguish between them. It was created using new 1.4 mechanics that allows changing the water color without affecting the actual textures. This means you can have any other texture pack along with this one; and still have the different colors!

Some common biomes that will get their water affected are the following:

Plains are lighter
Forests are green
Sunflower plains are golden
Ice biomes are much lighter
Warm oceans are teal
Cold oceans are dark blue
Extreme hills are purple / red (depending on their sub biome)
Deserts are beaches have beige water
Mesa / badlands have orange water
short_description: As the name suggests, this pack affects water. This pack changes the color for almost every biome in the game.

description:
The frame is removed from the glass which makes stained glass blocks connect more smoothly. Also the texture have been redesigned to give a more clean appearance. This pack is suited for anyone who like simplistic, clean and modern designs.

Features
This texture pack is mixed the Connectable glass texture pack and the cleaner stained glass pack together.
This texture pack connects the glass block textures by removing the frame and makes the glass more clean by removing the pixels in the center of the block.
This pack works flawlessly on both version 1.2 / 1.3 / 1.4 / 1.5 and the 1.6 beta.
short_description: This texture pack is a very neat upgrade for the stained glass textures.

description:
All of the buttons for the user interface now look like Japanese letters and symbols. Many of the natural terrain blocks are also changed into a more nice and clean Japanese design. This texture pack will hopefully be updated regularly.

Changelog

Trap door
Salmon
Addition of banner pattern
short_description: YAMATOtexture is a Japanese styled texture pack which customizes both the user interface and the textures for blocks and items.
